casebody.data:
REGENCY CENTERS ACQUISITION, LLC
v.
CRESCENT ACQUISTIONS, LLC 134A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 10, 2018 Mark E. Anderson, Attorney at Law, Tracy S. DeMarco, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Regency Centers Acquisitions, LLC. Kiran H. Mehta, Sara S. Ash, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, for Crescent Acquisitions, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of August 2018 by Plaintiff to Hold Case in Advance of Settlement:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of August 2018."
